mapper.select: SELECT THEME.LINKURL AS LINKURL, THEME.STOCKSECTOR AS STOCKSECTOR, SUBSTRING(THEME.STOCKFORUMDESCRIPTION,1,65) AS STOCKFORUMDESCRIPTION,THEME.STOCKSETID AS STOCKSETID FROM STOCK_POOL_MAIN_THEME_TABLE THEME WHERE THEME.STOCKPOOL_ID =#{stockPoolId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STOCK_POOL_MAIN_THEME_RESOURCE_TABLE RESOURCE WHERE RESOURCE.STOCKSETID = #{stockSetId}
